abstract: The investor Carl C. Icahn bid $955.9 million yesterday for WCI Communities, the Florida builder of condominiums and single-family homes, after saying he wanted to oust the board because the stock was undervalued.
snippet: The investor Carl C. Icahn bid $955.9 million yesterday for WCI Communities, the Florida builder of condominiums and single-family homes, after saying he wanted to oust the board because the stock was undervalued.
lead_paragraph: The investor Carl C. Icahn bid $955.9 million yesterday for WCI Communities, the Florida builder of condominiums and single-family homes, after saying he wanted to oust the board because the stock was undervalued.

headline.main: Icahn Makes Bid for Florida Home Builder
headline.print_headline: Icahn Makes Bid for Florida Home Builder
